## Private Member Functions

### assignCustomValue() {#ab2d6c2caf8e37548bebbe758c101612e}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>unsigned MipsIncomingValueHandler::assignCustomValue (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/calllowering/arginfo">CallLowering::ArgInfo</a> &amp; Arg, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/ccvalassign">CCValAssign</a> &gt; VAs, std::function&lt; void()&gt; &#42; Thunk=nullptr)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Handle cases when f64 is split into 2 32-bit GPRs.

This is a custom assignment because generic code assumes getNumRegistersForCallingConv is accurate. In this case it is not because the type/number are context dependent on other arguments.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipscalllowering-cpp/#l00105">105</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipscalllowering-cpp">MipsCallLowering.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

  labels = {["virtual"]}>
The specified value has been assigned to a stack location.

Load or store it there, with appropriate extension if necessary.

### getStackAddress() {#a00fb5d3ab9ae791d5ce59a5160419df5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Register MipsIncomingValueHandler::getStackAddress (uint64&#95;t MemSize, int64&#95;t Offset, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/machinepointerinfo">MachinePointerInfo</a> &amp; MPO, <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/isd/argflagsty">ISD::ArgFlagsTy</a> Flags)</>}
  labels = {["virtual"]}>
Materialize a VReg containing the address of the specified stack-based object.

This is either based on a FrameIndex or direct SP manipulation, depending on the context. <code>MPO</code> should be initialized to an appropriate description of the address created.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipscalllowering-cpp/#l00098">98</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/mips/mipscalllowering-cpp">MipsCallLowering.cpp</a>.
